Package it.unipr.sowide.actodes.examples.buffer

Class Buffer

java.lang.Object
it.unipr.sowide.actodes.actor.Behavior
it.unipr.sowide.actodes.examples.buffer.Buffer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
EmptyBuffer, FullBuffer, PartialBuffer
public abstract class Buffer
extends Behavior
The Buffer class provides a partial implementation of a bounded buffer based on behavior change.
See Also:
EmptyBuffer, FullBuffer, PartialBuffer, Serialized Form
